# pygrater
![pygrater logo][pygrater-logo]

_An elegant way to search Google without searching Google_
 
 This tool will take a user input (question) and respond with a Google answer snippet.
 
 **Example:**  
 Q: How high is the Empire State Building?  
 [A: 381 m, 443 m to tip][answer-link]
 
 
 ## Gary
 
 
 ## Zach
 
 
 ## Michael
 



[answer-link]: https://www.google.ca/search?source=hp&ei=xxIsYJDrJs610PEP_OecmA8&iflsig=AINFCbYAAAAAYCwg17UEoo_-T9Nru_zU8pZBH1F_aPkF&q=how+high+is+the+empire+state+building&oq=how+high+is+the+empire+&gs_&sclient=gws-wiz
[pygrater-logo]:
